entry.title: Human Readable Bitcoin Payment Instructions
entry.summary: The discussion highlights an issue encountered with a message that was split into two parts, indicating a probable limitation in the system handling the message. The first segment of the message contains exactly 255 characters, suggesting a character limit is enforced by the system, leading to the message being divided. This observation points towards a restriction within the communication or processing mechanism that necessitates splitting messages beyond a certain length, in this case, 255 characters.
